entry.question: If my opponent has Secret Actions in their hand, scrap pile, or even in their KO area (say because of Daring Escape), do those count?
entry.answer: No. Decipher counts only the Secret Actions in your opponentâ€™s played area.

entry.question: If my opponent has one face up Secret Action and two face down Secret Actions, do I do 1 damage to each enemy, or 3?
entry.answer: You would do 1 damage to each enemy, then 1 damage again, and then finally 1 damage again. The 'or' in "face up or face down" should be read as 'and/or', and the damage is one at a time rather than all at once.
